## Installation

You can install the released version of sfquadrants from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("sfquadrants")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("robinlovelace/sfquadrants")
```

## Example

```{r}
library(sf)
devtools::load_all()
plot(sq_study_region)
```

The aim is to be able to break up geographical space into discrete chunks.
The syntax is designed to be user friendly, e.g.:

```{r}
q = sq_quadrat(sq_study_region, 4) # break into 4
plot(q)
```
